mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `jgv`.movie (mo_title, mo_date, mo_time, mo_plot, mo_booking_rate, mo_ending, ra_num) VALUES (#{movie.moTitle},#{movie.moDate},#{movie.moTime},#{movie.moPlot},#{movie.moBookingRate},#{movie.moEnding}, #{raiting})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mo_num AS 'moNum', m.mo_title AS 'moTitle', m.mo_date AS 'moDate', m.mo_time AS 'moTime', m.mo_plot AS 'moPlot', m.mo_booking_rate AS 'moBookingRate', i.m_img_url AS 'm_img_url' FROM jgv.movie m LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image i ON m.mo_num = i.mo_num WHERE m.mo_ending IS NULL

SELECT m.mo_num AS moNum, mo_title AS moTitle, i.m_img_url AS m_img_url, mo_date AS moDate, mo_time AS moTime, mo_plot AS moPlot, mo_booking_rate AS moBookingRate, r.ra_grade AS grade, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT g.ge_name) AS genres, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT y.co_name) AS countries, d.ch_name AS directorName, d_img.c_img_url AS directorImage, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT a.ch_name) AS actorNames, GROUP_CONCAT(a_img.c_img_url) AS actorImages FROM jgv.movie m LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image i ON m.mo_num = i.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.rating r ON m.ra_num = r.ra_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_genere mg ON m.mo_num = mg.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.genre g ON mg.ge_num = g.ge_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_country my ON m.mo_num = my.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.country y ON my.co_num = y.co_num
LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc ON m.mo_num = mc.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.charactor d ON mc.ch_num = d.ch_num AND d.ch_job = '감독' LEFT JOIN jgv.charactor a ON mc.ch_num = a.ch_num AND a.ch_job = '배우' LEFT JOIN jgv.charactor_image d_img ON d.ch_num = d_img.ch_num LEFT JOIN jgv.charactor_image a_img ON a.ch_num = a_img.ch_num WHERE m.mo_num = #{id} GROUP BY m.mo_num

SELECT m.mo_title AS movieTitle, mi.m_img_url AS movieImage, m.mo_num AS movieNum FROM jgv.movie m INNER JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc ON m.mo_num = mc.mo_num INNER JOIN jgv.charactor c ON mc.ch_num = c.ch_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image mi on m.mo_num = mi.mo_num WHERE c.ch_job = '감독' AND c.ch_name = #{director} ORDER BY m.mo_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT m.mo_num AS moNum, mo_title AS moTitle, mo_date AS moDate, mo_time AS moTime, mo_plot AS moPlot, mo_booking_rate AS moBookingRate, ra_num AS raNum, m_img_url AS m_img_url FROM jgv.movie m LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image mi on m.mo_num = mi.mo_num WHERE m.mo_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY m.mo_date DESC LIMIT #{offsetCount}, #{countPerPage}

SELECT c.ch_num AS chNum, ch_name AS chName, ch_job AS chJob, ch_birth AS chBirth, ch_nation AS chNation, MIN(c_img_num) AS CImgNum, -- 가장 작은 이미지 번호 MIN(c_img_url) AS CImgUrl -- 가장 작은 번호의 이미지 URL FROM jgv.charactor c LEFT JOIN jgv.charactor_image ci ON c.ch_num = ci.ch_num WHERE c.ch_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') GROUP BY c.ch_num, ch_name, ch_job, ch_birth, ch_nation

SELECT m.mo_num AS moNum, mo_title AS moTitle, mo_date AS moDate, mo_time AS moTime, mo_plot AS moPlot, mo_booking_rate AS moBookingRate, mc.ch_num AS chNum, mc.mo_num AS moNum, i.m_img_url AS m_img_url FROM jgv.movie m INNER JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc ON m.mo_num = mc.mo_num INNER JOIN jgv.charactor c ON mc.ch_num = c.ch_num INNER JOIN jgv.movie_image i ON m.mo_num = i.mo_num WHERE c.ch_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT m.mo_num AS moNum, m.mo_title AS movieTitle, mi.m_img_url AS movieImage FROM jgv.movie m INNER JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc ON m.mo_num = mc.mo_num INNER JOIN jgv.charactor c ON mc.ch_num = c.ch_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image mi ON m.mo_num = mi.mo_num WHERE c.ch_name = #{actorName} AND c.ch_job IN ('감독', '배우') ORDER BY m.mo_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT DISTINCT m.mo_num AS moNum, m.mo_title AS movieTitle, mi.m_img_url AS movieImage FROM jgv.movie m INNER JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc ON m.mo_num = mc.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image mi ON m.mo_num = mi.mo_num WHERE mc.ch_num = #{charId} ORDER BY m.mo_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jgv.movie WHERE mo_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT m.mo_num AS 'moNum', m.mo_title AS 'moTitle', m.mo_date AS 'moDate', m.mo_time AS 'moTime', m.mo_plot AS 'moPlot', m.mo_booking_rate AS 'moBookingRate', i.m_img_url AS 'm_img_url' FROM jgv.movie m LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image i ON m.mo_num = i.mo_num WHERE CURRENT_DATE() > STR_TO_DATE(mo_date, '%Y.%m.%d') ORDER BY mo_booking_rate DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT m.mo_num AS 'moNum', m.mo_title AS 'moTitle', m.mo_date AS 'moDate', m.mo_time AS 'moTime', m.mo_plot AS 'moPlot', m.mo_booking_rate AS 'moBookingRate', i.m_img_url AS 'm_img_url' FROM jgv.movie m LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image i ON m.mo_num = i.mo_num WHERE STR_TO_DATE(mo_date, '%Y.%m.%d') > CURRENT_DATE() LIMIT 20
mapper.update: UPDATE jgv.movie SET mo_ending = NOW() WHERE mo_num = #{movieId} AND mo_ending IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT m.mo_num AS moNum, mo_title AS moTitle, mo_date AS moDate, mo_time AS moTile, mo_plot AS moPlot, mo_booking_rate AS moBookingRate, mo_ending AS moEnding, m.ra_num AS raNum, ra_grade AS raGrade, m_img_num AS mImgNum, m_img_url AS mImgUrl, g.ge_num AS geNum, g.ge_name AS geName, c.ch_num AS chNum, c.ch_name AS chName, c2.co_num AS coNum, c2.co_name AS coName, ci.c_img_url AS cImgUrl FROM jgv.movie m LEFT JOIN jgv.rating r ON r.ra_num = m.ra_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_genere mg ON m.mo_num = mg.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.genre g ON g.ge_num = mg.ge_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_image mi ON m.mo_num = mi.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc ON m.mo_num = mc.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.charactor c ON c.ch_num = mc.ch_num LEFT JOIN jgv.charactor_image ci on c.ch_num = ci.ch_num LEFT JOIN jgv.movie_country mc2 ON m.mo_num = mc2.mo_num LEFT JOIN jgv.country c2 ON c2.co_num = mc2.co_num WHERE m.mo_num = #{movieNum};
mapper.update: UPDATE jgv.movie SET mo_date = #{moDate}, mo_time = #{moTile}, mo_plot = #{moPlot}, ra_num = (SELECT ra_num FROM jgv.rating WHERE ra_grade = #{raGrade}) WHERE mo_num = #{moNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jgv.movie_genere (mo_num, ge_num) SELECT #{movieNum}, ge_num FROM jgv.genre WHERE ge_name = #{genre}
INSERT INTO jgv.movie_country (mo_num, co_num) SELECT #{movieNum}, co_num FROM jgv.country WHERE co_name = #{country}
